chart_description: This chart measures the time taken for I/O requests to complete under full pressure (when there is no available memory) in milliseconds.

dimension_descriptions.full 10: This dimension represents the 10th percentile value of the I/O full pressure stall time.
dimension_descriptions.full 300: This dimension represents the 300th percentile (max) value of the I/O full pressure stall time.
dimension_descriptions.full 60: This dimension represents the 60th percentile value of the I/O full pressure stall time.
